ValidationRule.description: Case 33073073 - H&B Renewal Date is required when associated Oppty has Type of 'Medical' and Probability > 50%
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), Probability >= 0.50, ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c, 'Medical'), ISBLANK(TEXT(Account.H_B_Renewal_Date__c)), OR ($RecordType.Name = 'HNBF Opportunity DSA Record Type' ,$RecordType.Name = 'HNBF Opportunity Record Type' ) ), AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), Probability >= 0.50, ISBLANK(TEXT(Account.H_B_Renewal_Date__c)), OR ($RecordType.Name = 'Prism PEO Opportunity FSS Record Type' ,$RecordType.Name = 'Prism PEO Opportunity Record Type', $RecordType.Name = 'PEO Opportunity FSS Record Type', $RecordType.Name = 'PEO Opportunity Record Type') ) ), OR ($User.Job_Name__c = 'Sales Representative' ,$User.Job_Name__c = 'District Sales Manager' ,$User.Job_Name__c = 'District Sales Assistant' ,$User.Job_Name__c = 'Area Manager' ,$User.Job_Name__c = 'Area Assistant' ,$User.Job_Name__c = 'Zone Manager' ,$User.Job_Name__c = 'Zone Assistant'), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, 'System Administrator')), DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2019,08,06) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: H&B Renewal Date on Prospect-Client is required.
